nodes.bodyText: If you want the JavaHelp system to index and provide links to these, there's a specific format for anchors needed. It needs to have both "name" and "id".  See https://www.jmri.org/help/en/html/doc/Technical/Help.shtml

nodes.bodyText:
Bob -
Actually, I'm the one who added the text to Help.sthml that says that!  However, when I ran this page through validator.w3c.org under HTML 4.01, it told me that there was no such thing as "name" so I took them out thinking it had something to do with being embedded within the dt tag.
Jerry
